__e: I had thought of that, but we must be careful and discreet.
Oh, there's a time for keeping quiet, Miss Bartlett... and there's a time for speaking out.
This is much the best obvious way of getting you out of Turkey.
It's not very discreet of me to come to your room.
Discretion dictates that I shall not load the treasure... out of the British man-of-war.
- She may have... You and she have been talking about it. Do you deny it?
Yeah? You think something's on the quiet, and it turns out everybody knows.
Honestly, I don't think we do.
Your old man kind of kept you under wraps.
I will not report you on this occasion, but see that you are more discreet in future.
Now the word is, you're clean and discreet... except for that...
